edu.packt.neuralnet

Class InputNeuron

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.packt.neuralnet.Neuron
      • edu.packt.neuralnet.InputNeuron

  • public class InputNeuron
extends Neuron
    InputNeuron This class inherits from Neuron, since it is a special case for a Neuron, which is at the Neural Network Input Layer
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Alan de Souza, Fabio Soares

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void init()
      init Method for initialization of the input neuron, it just adds the weights with 1's values and a 0 at the bias
